structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS

law.catch_line: Name and corporate powers of district.
law.text: The district shall be known by and under the name of Air Pollution Control District of .... County, and under such name shall be a public body corporate and a political subdivision of the Commonwealth.
law.history: Created 1952 Ky. Acts ch. 53, sec. 12, effective March 14, 1952.
